languages.text: "Враги пытались отнять у Человечества то, что мы завоевали, но ты всегда вставал{mf||а} на их пути. Веабос-6 должен был пасть и стать безбожной пустошью, но вместо этого обратился в крепость уединения и размышлений для ищущих покаяния. Эта неуступчивость — твоя великая добродетель".

"Humanity's foes tried time after time to rob us of what we had conquered, but you were always there to stand in their path. Vheabos VI was doomed to fall and become a heathen wasteland, but instead it rose as a bastion of solitude and contemplation for those seeking repentance. This implacability is your great virtue."
languages.original_text: "Враги пытались отнять у Человечества то, что мы завоевали, но ты всегда вставал{mf||а} на их пути. Веабос-6 должен был пасть и стать безбожной пустошью, но вместо этого обратился в крепость уединения и размышлений для ищущих покаяния. Эта неуступчивость — твоя великая добродетель".

traits.locale_text: "Humanity's foes tried time after time to rob it of what we had conquered, but you were always there to stand in their path. Vheabos VI was doomed to fall and become a heathen wasteland, but instead it rose as a fortress of solitude and contemplation for those seeking repentance. This implacability is your great virtue."

"Humanity's foes tried time after time to rob it of what we had conquered, but you were always there to stand in their path. Vheabos VI was doomed to fall and become a heathen wasteland, but instead it rose as a fortress of solitude and contemplation for those seeking repentance. This implacability is your great virtue."

"Humanity's foes tried time after time to rob us of what we had conquered, but you were always there to stand in their path. Vheabos VI was doomed to fall and become a heathen wasteland, but instead it rose as a bastion of solitude and contemplation for those seeking repentance. This implacability is your great virtue."

"Humanity's foes tried time after time to rob us of what we had conquered, but you were always there to stand in their path. Vheabos VI was doomed to fall and become a heathen wasteland, but instead it rose as a bastion of solitude and contemplation for those seeking repentance. This implacability is your great virtue."

"Humanity's foes tried time after time to rob us of what we had conquered, but you were always there to stand in their path. Vheabos VI was doomed to fall and become a heathen wasteland, but instead it rose as a bastion of solitude and contemplation for those seeking repentance. This implacability is your great virtue."

languages.text: "Die Feinde der Menschheit haben immer wieder versucht, uns zu rauben, was wir erobert hatten, aber Ihr habt Euch ihnen stets in den Weg gestellt. Vheabos-VI war dazu verdammt, unterzugehen und zu einem heidnischen Ödland zu verkommen, aber stattdessen wurde es eine Bastion der Einsamkeit und Kontemplation für willige Büßer. Diese Unerbittlichkeit ist Eure große Tugend."
languages.original_text: "Humanity's foes tried time after time to rob us of what we had conquered, but you were always there to stand in their path. Vheabos VI was doomed to fall and become a heathen wasteland, but instead it rose as a bastion of solitude and contemplation for those seeking repentance. This implacability is your great virtue."

traits.locale_text: "Die Feinde der Menschheit haben immer wieder versucht, uns zu rauben, was wir erobert hatten, aber Ihr habt Euch ihnen stets in den Weg gestellt. Vheabos-VI war dazu verdammt, unterzugehen und zu einem heidnischen Ödland zu verkommen, aber stattdessen wurde es eine Bastion der Einsamkeit und Kontemplation für willige Büßer. Diese Unerbittlichkeit ist Eure große Tugend."

languages.text: « Les ennemis de l'humanité ont souvent tenté de nous dérober ce que nous avions conquis, mais vous avez toujours été là pour les en empêcher. Vhéabos-VI était condamnée à tomber et à sombrer dans le paganisme, mais au lieu de cela, elle est devenue un bastion de solitude et de méditation pour ceux qui cherchent à se repentir. L'implacabilité, telle est votre plus grande qualité. »
languages.original_text: "Humanity's foes tried time after time to rob us of what we had conquered, but you were always there to stand in their path. Vheabos VI was doomed to fall and become a heathen wasteland, but instead it rose as a bastion of solitude and contemplation for those seeking repentance. This implacability is your great virtue."

traits.locale_text: « Les ennemis de l'humanité ont souvent tenté de nous dérober ce que nous avions conquis, mais vous avez toujours été là pour les en empêcher. Vhéabos-VI était condamnée à tomber et à sombrer dans le paganisme, mais au lieu de cela, elle est devenue un bastion de solitude et de méditation pour ceux qui cherchent à se repentir. L'implacabilité, telle est votre plus grande qualité. »

languages.text: 「人類の敵は幾度となく、我々が征服したものを奪おうと試みた。ヴィアボス・VIは没落し、異教徒の荒れ地となる運命にあった。だが、リペンタンスを求める人々のための孤独と思索の砦として蘇ったのだ。この不屈の精神こそ、あなたの偉大な美徳なのだ」
languages.original_text: "Humanity's foes tried time after time to rob us of what we had conquered, but you were always there to stand in their path. Vheabos VI was doomed to fall and become a heathen wasteland, but instead it rose as a bastion of solitude and contemplation for those seeking repentance. This implacability is your great virtue."

traits.locale_text: 「人類の敵は幾度となく、我々が征服したものを奪おうと試みた。ヴィアボス・VIは没落し、異教徒の荒れ地となる運命にあった。だが、リペンタンスを求める人々のための孤独と思索の砦として蘇ったのだ。この不屈の精神こそ、あなたの偉大な美徳なのだ」

languages.text: «Los enemigos de la Humanidad han intentado una y otra vez arrebatarnos lo que hemos conquistado, pero siempre ha estado ahí para impedírselo. Vheabos VI estaba condenado a caer y convertirse en un páramo profano, pero en lugar de eso se alzó como un bastión de soledad y contemplación para los arrepentidos. Esa severidad es su mayor virtud».
languages.original_text: "Humanity's foes tried time after time to rob us of what we had conquered, but you were always there to stand in their path. Vheabos VI was doomed to fall and become a heathen wasteland, but instead it rose as a bastion of solitude and contemplation for those seeking repentance. This implacability is your great virtue."

traits.locale_text: «Los enemigos de la Humanidad han intentado una y otra vez arrebatarnos lo que hemos conquistado, pero siempre ha estado ahí para impedírselo. Vheabos VI estaba condenado a caer y convertirse en un páramo profano, pero en lugar de eso se alzó como un bastión de soledad y contemplación para los arrepentidos. Esa severidad es su mayor virtud».

languages.text: “人类之敌一次次妄图夺走我们所征服的一切，而你却始终在奋力反抗。如果没有你，维博斯六号星将注定堕落，成为异端横行的废土。而现在，它却成为了坚毅的堡垒，寻求忏悔的人可以在那里独处、反思。这种毫不妥协的态度，正是你最大的美德。”
languages.original_text: "Humanity's foes tried time after time to rob us of what we had conquered, but you were always there to stand in their path. Vheabos VI was doomed to fall and become a heathen wasteland, but instead it rose as a bastion of solitude and contemplation for those seeking repentance. This implacability is your great virtue."

traits.locale_text: “人类之敌一次次妄图夺走我们所征服的一切，而你却始终在奋力反抗。如果没有你，维博斯六号星将注定堕落，成为异端横行的废土。而现在，它却成为了坚毅的堡垒，寻求忏悔的人可以在那里独处、反思。这种毫不妥协的态度，正是你最大的美德。”

languages.text: "İnsanlığın düşmanları, fethettiğimiz ne varsa elimizden almayı tekrar tekrar denedi ancak sen her zaman onların yoluna çıktın. Vheabos VI düşmeye ve çorak bir kâfir yuvası olmaya mahkûm iken bunun yerine tövbekârların inzivaya çekilip öz muhakeme yapabileceği bir yuvaya dönüştü. Bu tavizsizlik, en yüce erdemin."
languages.original_text: "Humanity's foes tried time after time to rob us of what we had conquered, but you were always there to stand in their path. Vheabos VI was doomed to fall and become a heathen wasteland, but instead it rose as a bastion of solitude and contemplation for those seeking repentance. This implacability is your great virtue."
